summary: The module defines data structures and metric logic for assessing the relevance of multimodal (image‑and‑text) content in retrieval‑augmented generation pipelines. It encapsulates input data, converts it to a textual form for processing, and provides functions to compute both per‑turn and overall relevance scores using language model prompts.
business_intent: Enable organizations to quantitatively evaluate how well AI systems that handle both visual and textual information respond to user queries, supporting quality assurance and continuous improvement of multimodal conversational agents.
